HTML HOME.notes: Explore the different sections to learn about HTML concepts, syntax, and best practices.

HTML Intro.notes: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language and is the standard markup language for creating web pages.

HTML Syntax.notes:
HTML elements are represented by tags such as

, ,

, etc.

HTML Elements.notes: Elements are the building blocks of HTML pages.

HTML Attributes.notes: Attributes provide additional information about elements.

HTML Headings.notes: Headings are defined with <h1> to <h6> tags.

HTML Paragraphs.notes:
Paragraphs are defined with the

tag.

HTML Links.notes: Links are defined with the <a> tag.

HTML Images.notes: Images are defined with the tag.

HTML Lists.notes: Lists can be ordered (<ol>) or unordered (<ul>).

HTML Tables.notes: Tables are defined with the <table> tag.
